title: Pixel XL 2 Slow Wireless Until Reboot
content: Every week or so wireless will basically move no data. I will see apps loading data slowly, so I will run a speed test. I get about 0.02 Mbps down and about 1Mbps up, if it can even load. After a reboot of the phone I will get 100x5, my actual connection speed. This is a new issues sometime within the last 3 to 4 months.
